shortdesc.ph: Enables interoperability with the Agora Web SDK (for Live Streaming only).
Enables or disables interoperability with Agora Web SDK, only applicable in Live Broadcast Low Latency mode.

dlentry.dd: This method is deprecated. The SDK automatically enables interoperability with the Web SDK. No need to call this method.
This method is deprecated. The SDK automatically enables interoperability with the Web SDK, so you do not need to call this method.

section.p: You can call this method to enable or disable interoperability with the Agora Web SDK. If there are Web SDK users in the channel, you must call this method; otherwise, the video of Native users will appear black on the web. This method only applies to Live Streaming. In Voice Call, interoperability is enabled by default.

If there are Web SDK users in the channel, you must call this method; otherwise, Native users' video will appear black on the web. This method is only applicable in Live Broadcast Low Latency mode. In the voice call scenario, interoperability is enabled by default.

plentry.pd:
Whether to enable interoperability:
: Enable interoperability.
: (default) Disable interoperability.

Whether to enable interoperability:
: Enable interoperability.
: (default) Disable interoperability.
